wire.label: WHO IS EQUIPILATES?
wire.title: Reference in high-performance Pilates Equipment. We elevate the technical standard of your studio.
wire.classicText: Absolute fidelity to Joseph Pilates' original method. Our classic line uses exact measurements and calibrated springs to ensure pure biomechanics, ideal for studios that prioritize tradition and technical results.
wire.contempText: Innovation and versatility for today's fitness market. Our contemporary line offers quick adjustments and advanced ergonomics, perfect for dynamic studios seeking high student flow and maximum durability.

origin.label: THE FOUNDER'S DNA
origin.title: Equipment Designed by Someone Who
origin.text1: Founded in 2006 by physiotherapist Rafael Iazpeck, Equipilates was born from a real need: Pilates equipment that truly respects biomechanics and Joseph Pilates' original method.
origin.text2: Unlike other brands, our Pilates Equipment is not just designed by engineers. It's developed by someone who understands the human body, movement and rehabilitation.
origin.highlight: Pilates equipment designed by a physiotherapist, manufactured with technical rigor and total respect for Joseph Pilates' legacy.
origin.cta: ðŸ’¬ Talk to a Specialist Now
line.classica.label: CLASSIC LINE
line.classica.title: Tradition with Precision
line.classica.text: Exact original measurements, pure biomechanics and noble materials. Ideal for purist instructors and studios that value faithful practice and profound results.
line.classica.feature1: Certified Solid Wood or high-quality Stainless Steel
line.classica.feature3: Perfect for rehabilitation and traditional teaching

faq.label: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.title: Questions About Pilates Equipment
faq.q1: What's the difference between Reformer and Cadillac?
faq.a1: The Reformer is the most well-known Pilates equipment, with sliding carriage and adjustable springs. The Cadillac (also called Trap Table) is a vertical structure with bars, springs and accessories, ideal for exercises in different positions. Both are essential in a complete studio.
faq.q2: How long does Pilates equipment last?
faq.a2: With quality materials like stainless steel, certified solid wood and proper maintenance, our Pilates equipment lasts for decades. We offer 2 years warranty and lifetime technical assistance.
faq.q3: How to choose between Classic and Contemporary Line?
faq.a3: The Classic Line follows Joseph Pilates' exact original measurements, ideal for purist instructors and rehabilitation. The Contemporary Line offers more versatility and quick adjustments, perfect for studios with intense flow and larger groups.
faq.q4: Which countries does Equipilates export to?
faq.a4: We export Pilates equipment to over 24 countries, including the United States, France, United Kingdom, South Korea, Portugal, Spain, Germany and other demanding markets.
faq.q5: Where is the Equipilates factory located?
faq.a5: Our 2,500mÂ² factory is located in Resende-RJ, Brazil, in the Elite neighborhood. We manufacture all Pilates equipment with rigorous quality control.
faq.a6: All our equipment comes with 2 years factory-direct warranty, plus specialized technical assistance throughout Brazil.
faq.a7: We work with flexible installment plans up to 24x on the website and special conditions up to 36x for direct purchases.
faq.q8: Does Equipilates serve all of Brazil?
faq.a8: Yes! We serve the entire national territory with shipping to all regions.
faq.q9: How to receive a personalized quote?
faq.a9: Contact us via WhatsApp (21) 96732-9318, available 24 hours a day.
